name: Shark Chomp Run
description:
My submission for MFGG's 2021 Winter Game Jam!

Shark Chomp will chase either Mario or the unlockable Toad in this endless runner.

Controls are simple: arrow keys to walk, Z to jump, and X to boost! You can boost once the P-Meter has filled up.

It's simple, but may take a bit to master. See if you can get into the leaderboards!
